== Beypore (CT) (627437) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Beypore (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 10.41 sq. km. and harbouring 14035 households with total population of 69752 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 428 km. Male population is 33399 and female population is 36353. Scheduled Caste population is 1282 and Scheduled Tribes population is 107. Census Location Code of the town is 627437<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (Population 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 12 km. Railway station is at Kallai at a distance of 6 km.
